extendedIngredients.name: fennel bulb

title: Salad of Fennel, Arugula, and Ricotta Salata
summary: Salad of Fennel, Arugula, and Ricotta Salata might be just the side dish you are searching for. One portion of this dish contains approximately 6g of protein, 11g of fat, and a total of 139 calories. This recipe serves 6 and costs $1.01 per serving. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian diet. A mixture of arugula, fennel bulb, lemon juice, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 55%. This score is solid. Try Arugula Salad With Blood Oranges, Fennel & Ricotta Salata, Meatless Monday: Arugula Pesto Pasta with Roasted Fennel and Ricotta Salata, and Arugula Salad with Ricotta Salata for similar recipes.
instructions: Preparation                                                        Whisk shallot and lemon juice in small bowl to blend. Gradually whisk in oil. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Let stand 15 minutes to blend flavors.                                                                Combine arugula and sliced fennel in large bowl. Toss with enough dressing to coat salad. Add shaved cheese; toss gently and serve.

steps.step: Whisk shallot and lemon juice in small bowl to blend. Gradually whisk in oil. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Let stand 15 minutes to blend flavors.
Combine arugula and sliced fennel in large bowl. Toss with enough dressing to coat salad.
Add shaved cheese; toss gently and serve.
